name: py312-slim (WSL minimal + Jupyter)
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'set -eux && apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libgl1 libglib2.0-0 openssh-client && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && git config --global user.name "${GIT_USER_NAME:-devuser}" && git config --global user.email "${GIT_USER_EMAIL:-dev@example.com}" && git config --global init.defaultBranch main && python -m pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r /workspace/requirements.txt && python -m ipykernel install --user --name=devcontainer-py312 --display-name="Python (devcontainer)"'
